org.jmisb.api.video

Interface IVideoFileInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, IVideoInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoFileInput

    public interface IVideoFileInput
extends IVideoInput
    Interface for reading video/metadata from a file

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play()
        Play the video file

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Check if the video file is playing
        Returns:
        True if currently playing

      • setPlaybackSpeed

        void setPlaybackSpeed(double multiplier)
        Set the playback speed
        Parameters:
        multiplier - The rate multiplier (e.g., 2.0 for 2x rate)

      • getPlaybackSpeed

        double getPlaybackSpeed()
        Get the current playback speed
        Returns:
        The rate multiplier (e.g., 2.0 for 2x rate)

        void pause()
        Pause video file playback

      • getDuration

        double getDuration()
        Get the total video file duration
        Returns:

      • getPosition

        double getPosition()
        Get the current playback position
        Returns:
        The current position, in seconds

      • seek

        void seek(double position)
        Seek to a specified position in the file
        Parameters:
        position - The desired position, in seconds

      • getNumFrames

        int getNumFrames()
        Get the number of video frames
        Returns:
